change.changenote: Section 1 definitions of "dental appliance" and "fit" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2020, effective February 24, 2020.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: dental appliance means an appliance or a device designed or offered for a dental condition or other condition of the orofacial complex, excluding a ready-to-use or self-adapted mouthguard designed or offered for temporary protection against injury during sporting activities;
fit means to perform any intra-oral procedure related to dispensing, including the making of impressions;
